mean_cn: n.科目；实验对象；  vt.使臣服，使顺从
mean_en: an area of knowledge that is studied in school; a thing or person that is being discussed, described or dealt with
sentence: English was my favorite subject in school.
sentence_trans: 英语是我在学校里最喜欢的学科。
word_etyma: sub在…下面 + ject投掷，扔 → 扔下去 → 服从的，扔下去让大家讨论的主题 → subject主题
